column4: is there some tool that allows me to mount (kind of like daemon tools (and yes i know about mount -o loop))
go to the acetoneiso site, it's a great app for all ISO mounting related stuff

just look at it, trust me you'll thank me, I know you want daemontools so this will be perfect for you

I personally prefer acetoneiso because of the features it provides.
its a very nice alcohol replacement
no its in powersaving mode now
if it's not installed sudo apt-get install nvidia-settings
